name: OXO PARQUES
overview:
NOMBRE : Fideicomiso Inmobiliario Oxo Parques

Oxo Parques es un conjunto habitacional de apartamentos que contiene 27 unidades desarrolladas en 2 bloques. Las unidades están comprendidas en PB mas 3 niveles. Adicionalmente, el complejo cuenta con un nivel de garages y espacios de uso común como gimnasio, sauna, vestuarios, sala de reuniones, sala de lavandería y piscina con solárium.

El proyecto se encuentra actualmente finalizado con la totalidad de sus unidades entregadas a los usuarios finales.
amenities:
Oxo Park is a housing complex of apartments containing 27 units developed in 2 blocks. The units are comprised of ground floor plus 3 levels. Additionally, the complex has a garage level and common areas such as
– Gym
– Sauna
– Locker Rooms
– Meeting Room
– Laundry Room
– Swimming Pool with Solarium.
about_project:
FINANCIACIÓN:

The financing was obtained directly from the Trustors, who, in this case being a trust at cost, are the end users.

A pre-sale of 100% of the units was generated prior to the start of construction and the project was developed through monthly payments until its completion.

A reservation of the land was obtained in advance and paid with the first 3 installments of contribution.

PERFORMANCE:

In terms of delivery time, there were no deviations from what was initially committed.

In economic terms, the deviation remained within the normal parameters for this type of development and was less than 4%.
